name: LD46 - Campfire in the dark
description:
You are in the dark.
There is something dangerous in the dark.
The only safe thing is the campfire.
Protect the campfire, wait for the dawn and escape the darkness.
Collect woods, light up them by the campfire, and place torches to gain more power.

Contols
Move: WSAD / Arrow Keys
LMB: Attack
RMB: Collect Wood / Place Torch

Development Tools
Unity 2019.3.7f1
Aseprite
Bfxr

LudumDare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/campfire-in-the-dark
